verses.verse: And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me came <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H5782>waked<s%> <S%H376>me<s%>, as a man that is <S%H5782>wakened<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, What seest <S%H559>thou<s%>? And I said, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%>, <S%H4501>and<s%>, behold, a candlestick all of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, with its <S%H1531>bowl<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H7651>it<s%>, and its seven <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H7651>thereon<s%>; there are seven <S%H4166>pipes<s%> to each of <S%H7651>the<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, which are upon the top <S%H7218>thereof<s%>;
and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive-trees<s%> by <S%H259>it<s%>, one upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H1543>bowl<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> upon the left side <S%H8040>thereof<s%>.
And I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, What are <S%H113>these<s%>, my lord?

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>me<s%>, Knowest thou not what these <S%H559>are<s%>? And I said, <S%H113>No<s%>, my lord.

Then he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Not by <S%H2428>might<s%>, nor by <S%H3581>power<s%>, but by my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Who art <S%H1419>thou<s%>, O great <S%H2022>mountain<s%>? <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> thou shalt become a <S%H4334>plain<s%>; and he shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the top <S%H68>stone<s%> with <S%H8663>shoutings<s%> of <S%H2580>Grace<s%>, <S%H2580>grace<s%>, unto it.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> have laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%>; his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall also <S%H1214>finish<s%> <S%H3045>it<s%>; and thou shalt know that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath sent me unto <S%H7971>you<s%>.

For who hath <S%H936>despised<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of small <S%H6996>things<s%>? for these seven shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H68>plummet<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>; <S%H7651>these<s%> are the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>I<s%>, and said unto <S%H8147>him<s%>, What are these two <S%H2132>olive-trees<s%> upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and upon the left side <S%H8040>thereof<s%>?

And I <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H559>time<s%>, and said unto <S%H8147>him<s%>, What are these two <S%H2132>olive<s%> - <S%H7641>branches<s%>, which are <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6804>spouts<s%>, that <S%H7324>empty<s%> the golden oil out of <S%H2091>themselves<s%>?
And he <S%H559>answered<s%> me and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou not what these <S%H559>are<s%>? And I said, <S%H113>No<s%>, my lord.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8147>he<s%>, These are the two <S%H3323>anointed<s%> <S%H1121>ones<s%>, that <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
